title: [UX] Configurable status line
description: Allow users to configure what appears in the status line (show/hide cost, tokens, path, branch, etc). Could use a config struct with booleans in settings, or a format string. Lower priority â€” pick good defaults first, add settings when users need different layouts.

logs.msg: Relative path display: show path relative to invocation dir with last component normal, prefix dim. e.g. dim(ion/src/)tui. Needs a current_dir field separate from session.working_dir when directory changes are supported.

Status line improvements done: adaptive width dropping, colored % (green/yellow/red), cyan branch, git diff stats (+N/-M green/red), project name instead of full path. Remaining: customizable script-based status line, multiline wrap, git state symbols.
